questions.question: What does active recall involve?
options: Testing yourself to retrieve information from memory
Highlighting all the key terms in your notes
questions.explanation: Active recall focuses on retrieving information from memory, rather than passive review.

questions.question: Which of the following is a practical method of active recall?
questions.explanation: Self-quizzing is a direct way to engage with active recall by retrieving answers without looking at the material.

questions.question: Why is summarizing concepts from memory effective?
options: It reinforces neural pathways by recalling details actively
questions.explanation: Summarizing from memory strengthens memory by engaging retrieval and cognitive effort.

questions.question: Which app is often used for active recall combined with spaced repetition?
questions.explanation: Anki is a powerful tool that integrates active recall and spaced repetition via flashcards.

questions.question: How does active recall improve exam performance?
options: It reduces the need to study altogether
It mirrors testing conditions and enhances retrieval speed
It focuses only on memorizing facts
It makes studying more passive and relaxed
questions.explanation: Active recall helps simulate exam environments, improving recall under pressure and enhancing learning retention.
